hero.title: The future belongs to those who shape AI strategies today.
hero.subtitle: wil-AI is a think tank for the sustainable and responsible integration of artificial intelligence into small and medium-sized enterprises (SMEs) — cross-industry, partnership-based, forward-thinking.

about.title: A Think Tank. Not an Agency.
about.description: wil-AI unites conviction, experience, and a healthy mix of generations. We are not a traditional consultancy — we see ourselves as strategic partners helping small and medium-sized enterprises (SMEs) navigate the global AI transformation to remain highly competitive.

cards.title: Partnership-Based
cards.text: We work as equals. No consultant jargon — real co-thinking and co-creating for your success.

cards.title: Responsible
cards.text: Sustainability and ethics aren't in our fine print — they are our guiding principle.

cards.title: Cross-Industry
cards.text: From regional manufacturing to global hidden champions — smart AI strategies tailored to the reality of the mid-market.

cards.title: Generational Mix
cards.text: Experience meets innovation. Our team brings together diverse perspectives and age groups.

vision.quote: We don't believe in AI for its own sake — we believe in AI as a tool that empowers global SMEs to create something better.

items.question: What makes wil-AI different from traditional consultancies?
items.answer: We're not a service provider who hands over a concept and disappears. We work as a strategic partner — as equals, long-term, and with genuine commitment to your success. Our focus is on sustainable AI integration tailored for SMEs, not on short-term projects.

items.question: When does wil-AI officially launch?
items.answer: We are currently in the founding phase. The official launch is planned for 2026. If you're already interested in a collaboration, feel free to contact us — we look forward to the conversation.

items.question: Which companies is wil-AI suitable for?
items.answer: Our focus and structure are optimally aligned with small and medium-sized enterprises (SMEs). Our expertise spans across industries — from manufacturing to financial services, healthcare, and retail. Anywhere established business processes can be globally optimized through AI.

items.question: Do I need technical background knowledge?
items.answer: No. We meet you exactly where you stand. Whether you already have initial AI experience or are completely new to the topic — we tailor our guidance individually to the reality and resources of your business.

items.question: How can I get in touch?
items.answer: Send us an email at ai-now@wil-ai.de. We'll get back to you promptly.

contact.title: Let's talk.
contact.subtitle: Have questions, ideas, or want to be part of our vision? We'd love to hear from you.
